name: QuadrifortemAdvisory
0:
”Alexa, open quadrifortem advisory”
”Alexa, start quadrifortem advisory”
”Alexa, launch quadrifortem advisory”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quadrifortem advisory
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Quadrifortem Advisory skill is aimed at small to medium sized startup hedge funds and family offices, with an aim to deliver our tailored and holistic advisory solutions. This skill is meant to be used as both an introduction to our advisory business and also as a method of engaging our services. The skill will at best introduce the user to the business and its services, and also provide some insights into our consultants and research and developments endeavours. The skill is meant to be a promote dialogue between the skill and the user to provide the user with as much information as possible about Quadrifortem Advisory. 
The skill also incorporates a basic vendor search function which based on the users utterance can search our vendor database and suggest vendors and our analysis of that vendor.
The skill can also provide a short selection of latest news items in the industry when the user requests for it.

We engage with all levels of client staff and vendor staff during our analysis and business to technology mapping phase to gain a deep understanding of the business and its technology strategy, its drive, and its goals; combined with our team of consultants who are industry experts.

Our advisory service is focused on delivery the service with the business in mind. Our expertise in both technology and the investment management industry enable us to provide this unique service. We enable the startup to reduce total cost of ownership and benefit from technology that suits the business model/strategy and scales accordingly.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
